# init(name:float:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new uniform object that holds a `4 x 4` matrix of floating-point numbers.

## Declaration

```swift
init(name: String, float value: GLKMatrix4)
```

## Parameters

- **name**: The name used to identify the uniform variable; you use this name inside your shader to read the uniform variableâ€™s value.
- **value**: The initial matrix for the uniform variable.

## Return Value

An initialized uniform object whose type is set to [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKUniformType/floatMatrix4].

## Creating and Initializing Uniform Objects

- **init(name:)**: Initializes a new uniform object.
- **init(name:float:)**: Initializes a new uniform object that holds a floating-point number.
